data.title: Mammootty mother Fatima Ismail passes away
data.meta_description: Mammootty mother Fatima Ismail passes away ﻿Mammootty's Mother Fatima Ismail, Mammootty Mother, Mammootty Mother dies
data.text:
Malayalam star Mammootty‘ mother Fatima Ismail passed away. Fatima Ismail, who is a leading actress of Malayalam cinema, passed away today. Fatima Ismail was 93. She was suffering from old age illness. She was undergoing treatment at a private hospital in Kochi.

She breathed her last in the early hours of Friday morning while undergoing treatment at a private hospital in Kochi. With the death of Mammootty’s mother, the Malayalam cinema is in a state of sadness.

Advertisement

Along with Mammootty, his younger son Dulquer Salmaan continues to be the top heroes in the Malayalam industry. Many film celebrities are condoling Mammootty’s family. It is learned that Fatima’s last rites are going to be performed at Chempu near her hometown Kottayam on Friday evening. Many celebrities and fans have expressed their condolence to actor Mammootty and his son Dulquer Salmaan.

It is reported that Mammootty is going to stay away from the promotions of the soon-to-be-released movie Agent after the death of his mother. The movie will be released on April 28 in Malayalam along with Telugu. Mammootty is playing a key role in this movie starring Akhil as the hero.
